channel.title: racism on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in racism on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Fair is not Lovely
item.description: Dear Women of India, I hope you will soon learn to laugh at the ads which endorse the notion that having lighter brown skin makes you more beautiful than you are already.

item.title: Enna Ithu: Feature Spoiler 'Nala Damayanthi '
item.description: If you are in love, you will love this song. The melody has a dreamy and floaty feeling to it and the lyrics describe the wonder and joy of being in love.
